sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import { Switch, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {Navbar, Nav, Container, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const Toolbar = () => { const quantity= useSelector(state => state.chart.value.quantity) const totalprice = useSelector(state => state.chart.value.totalPrice) console.log(`quantity: ${quantity}`) const [openCart, setOpenCart] = useState(false) const nav = useNavigate() function openthiscart(){ nav("/cart") setOpenCart(true) } function goback(){ nav("/") setOpenCart(false) } return ( <> {/*

Cart items: {quantity}

Total Price: {totalprice.toFixed(2)}

*/} Some Logo
Home Shop FAQs
) } export default Toolbar
